definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: We are going to pick apples next week.
sentences.chinese: 下星期我们打算去摘苹果。

sentences.english: The department's overall evaluation will be posted next week.
sentences.chinese: 这个部门的整体评量下星期将会公布。

sentences.english: Next week we shall be closed for stock-taking.
sentences.chinese: 下星期我们暂停营业盘点存货。

sentences.english: The wheat should head out next week if the weather remains sunny.
sentences.chinese: 要是天气继续晴朗，下星期麦子就会结穗。

sentences.english: We will put off the outing until next week, when we won’t be so busy.
sentences.chinese: 我们把郊游推迟到下星期，那时我们就不会这儿忙了。

sentences.english: There'll be a further performance of the play next week.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏下星期将加演一场。

sentences.english: I'm very sorry Sir, but our rooms are fully booked for the next week.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，本店一直到下星期的房间全都满额了。

sentences.english: B: I am scheduled to be out all of next week.
sentences.chinese: 我预定下星期整周都出去。

sentences.english: Have we enough firewood in for the coming week?
sentences.chinese: 下星期用的木柴我们已备足了吗？

sentences.english: My father will buy a new mtb for me next week.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲下星期就给我买新自行车。

sentences.english: The new train will be formed into the regular timetable from next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 下星期一起，这列新的列车将正式编入列车时刻表。

sentences.english: Athletic meets next week, this week to strengthen the training.
sentences.chinese: 下星期校运会，这星期要加强训练。

sentences.english: I would you spare some time to look at our art exhibition next week.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿你们下星期抽出点时间来看看我们的美术展。

sentences.english: He will be going to the beach next week when his boss call him to do this new case.
sentences.chinese: 下星期，他将会去海边，当他的上司叫他接新案子时。

sentences.english: We'll move to Building 5 early next week.
sentences.chinese: 我们下星期初搬到5号楼去。

sentences.english: Start excercising today to avoid the stresses of next week.
sentences.chinese: 今天开始运动来避免下星期产生压力。

definition: three days from now/day after day after tomorrow
